351.content: # C/C++ Sample Sources for CI Experiments This directory contains small, well-documented C and C++ translation units that exercise the C/C++ related tooling showcased in this repository: - `include/geometry.h` and `src/geometry.c` provide a handful of geometry helper functions written in C. - `include/greeter.hpp` and `src/greeter.cpp` deliver a simple C++ class used to model basic object-oriented behaviour.
